ee sandaha udaharanayak nam: 1- allahpe gunanෙ wishayapayahi eewa sansanndanaya karana pirisa ha eewa akriya karawana pirisa athara madhayasthawa pamowun sitinu atha. 2- allahta ayath kriyawan wishapayahi jabariyiya ha kadariyiyawarun athara madhayasthawa pamowun sitithi. 3- allahpe anathuru angawim ha wishwasa wishapayahi, pamowun almurjiaa saha alwaeediyiyawarun athara pamowun madhayasthawa pasu wana kandayama paw. 4- nabi (sal) thumananpe saheamin wishapayahi kawarja ha rafila warun athara madhayasthawa katayuthu karana kandayama pamowun paw.

mul yugayedi jothige handa ape sinamawe wikata naluwan sandaha da yoda ganina. 1958 wasare thiragatha wu ‘wana mohini’ chithrapataye richad albat (tasan) wenuwen ‘kola kada kada boruwata denawa’ githaya gayuwe jothiya. 1960 wasare thiragatha wu ‘nalangana’ chithrapatayata jothi ‘pani wahena katha’ githaya gayuwe edi jayamanna wenuweni.
